title: Alex Jones Show - 2013 Dec 20 FR [sebaygo1]
description:
The Alex Jones Show 
Friday, 20 December 2013


[sebaygo1]


Show Description
................

From the Infowars web site :: Alex exposes the current chilling effect on non-establishment viewpoints on this Friday, December 20 edition of The Alex Jones Show. The stars of Duck Dynasty may leave A&E entirely after the network suspended the patriarch of the family, Phil Robertson, for expressing his faith in a recent GQ article. Media pundits are calling Robertson's views on homosexuality "hate speech," which by their definition would surely include the Holy Bible as well. 

The founder of Freedom Watch, Larry Klayman, was also attacked by the mainstream media this week after he won a lawsuit against the NSA and he joins the show to break down the media's attempts to silence opposition. 

Well-known submersion journalist Amber Lyon also joins the broadcast to share her front-line experiences with Americans not afraid to stand up for the First Amendment.

 It is my opinion that in this time it is virtually
 essential to seek information from a variety of sources, 
 to listen to a spectrum of voices in order to better 
 understand the "big picture." A reliance solely upon
 mainstream corporate media for news and info is a 
 prescription for ignorance. I try to share information
 that counters the monotone of mainstream corporate media.
 
 NOTE: The material here is made available strictly as
 information. Do not assume my support for or endorsement 
 of the contents. 

 Think for yourself!
 To paraphrase the late William Cooper: 
 Read everything, listen to everything, but believe nothing 
 until you've researched it yourself.
